thread.section_title: AmericanFlags.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AmericanFlags.com | americanflags.com | 9 of 197
thread.title: William McDonald

author: William McDonald
title: William McDonald
text: After all the exchanges were done from Christmas gifts that were either too small, duplicates or whatever, I researched for a new flag for our home. After much exploring, I selected AmericanFlags as our provider. Delivery was incredibly fast and the product is outstanding. I felt so strongly about their product, I posted a Product Endorsement on my Facebook Page..I then gave THEIR FB page a like and share. I don't hesitate to let companies know when they've fallen short in regards to consumer satisfaction... nor do I hesitate when a company goes above and beyond the norms... Thanks American Flags!
